00010 ORRunDataProcessor::ORRunDataProcessor() : ORDataProcessor(new ORRunDecoder)
00011 {
00012   fRunDecoder = dynamic_cast<ORRunDecoder*>(fDataDecoder);
00013   fByteCount = 0;
00014   fIncreaseHeartbeatVerbosity = false;
00015 }

00017 ORRunDataProcessor::~ORRunDataProcessor()
00018 {
00019   if (fRunContext) {
00020     if(fRunContext->GetState() != ORRunContext::kIdle) {
00021       ORLog(kError) << "Deconstructing ORRunDataProcessor in non-idle state "
00022                     << fRunContext->GetState() << ": something has gone wrong" << endl;
00023     }
00024   }
00025   delete fRunDecoder;
00026 }

00028 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORRunDataProcessor::ProcessDataRecord(UInt_t* record)
00029 {
00030   fByteCount += fRunDecoder->LengthOf(record)*sizeof(UInt_t);
00031   return ORDataProcessor::ProcessDataRecord(record);
00032 }
00033 
00034 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORRunDataProcessor::ProcessMyDataRecord(UInt_t* record)
00035 {
00036   if (!fRunContext) {
00037     ORLog(kError) << "fRunContext is NULL!" << endl;
00038     return kFailure;
00039   }
00040   if (fRunDecoder->IsHeartBeat(record)) {
00041     string message;
00042     if(fByteCount < 1024) message = ::Form("%d B", fByteCount);
00043     else if(fByteCount < 1024*1024) message = ::Form("%.1f kB", float(fByteCount)/1024.0);
00044     else message = ::Form("%.1f MB", float(fByteCount)/1024.0/1024.0);
00045     message = ::Form("Heartbeat for run %d: %s have been processed since last heartbeat.", 
00046                      fRunContext->GetRunNumber(), message.c_str());
00047     if(fIncreaseHeartbeatVerbosity) ORLog(kRoutine) << message << endl;
00048     else ORLog(kTrace) << message << endl;
00049     fByteCount = 0;
00050     return ProcessRunHeartBeat(record);
00051   }
00052   else if (fRunDecoder->IsRunStart(record)) {
00053     if (fRunContext->GetRunNumber() != fRunDecoder->RunNumberOf(record)) {
00054       ORLog(kWarning) << "ProcessMyDataRecord(): "
00055                       << "run number in run-start record doesn't match "
00056                       << "that loaded from the header. Switching to new "
00057                       << "run number" << endl;
00058       fRunContext->LoadRunStartRecord(record);
00059     }
00060     fRunContext->SetStarting();
00061     ORLog(kRoutine) << "Start processing run " << fRunContext->GetRunNumber() << endl;
00062     return ProcessRunStart(record);
00063   } else if (fRunDecoder->IsRunStop(record)) {
00064     fRunContext->SetStopping();
00065     ORLog(kRoutine) << "Stop processing run " << fRunContext->GetRunNumber() << endl;
00066     return ProcessRunStop(record);
00067   } else {
00068     ORLog(kWarning) << "ProcessMyDataRecord(): "
00069                     << "got run data that wasn't a heartbeat, a start, "
00070                     << "or a stop" << endl;
00071     return kFailure;
00072   }
00073 }
